cont.entity_a: Feels cheap and sometimes requires tapping to get the bubble to react.
cont.entity_b: Solid construction and does not flex. Handles drops well.

cont.entity_a: Hash marks aren't crisply painted. The scale on the side is deceptive; the zero point is not at the edge of the black bumper. The measurement markings are easy to see. Ruler markings are not edge to edge.
Extremely light and well-balanced. Lightweight but not very sturdy.
cont.entity_b: Lightweight with cushioned grips. Lightweight but durable.

cont.entity_a: Includes a measurement scale in inches and centimeters. Three different water levels: 90°, 180°, and 45°. Adjustable angle measurement feature. Level inside can rotate to measure angles. Adjustable level feature is useful for non-traditional angles. The level is accurate.
cont.entity_b: Easy to read and accurate. Vials are clear and easy to read. Great precision level. Excellent quality and accuracy.

cont.entity_a: Not as durable as other 24-inch levels.
cont.entity_b: Well-built and serves for years. Tough and reliable.

cont.entity_a: Bubble in the fixed horizontal level and adjustable level did not match. The center bubble is too large, making it defective and unusable. Bubbles are easy to read.

cont.entity_b: Rubber grips and caps for safe handling. Lightweight with cushioned grips. Removable rubber ends.

cont.entity_a: Includes a window to view the level from the top.
cont.entity_b: High gloss durable enamel paint finish. High-quality craftsmanship.

cont.entity_a: Well-made and worth the money. Good for routine household use.
cont.entity_b: Expensive but worth the quality. Great value for price paid.
Great warranty. Lifetime replacement warranty if they fail to stay true.
